text.body:
Hi [[SCRIPT=ToFirstOrLastname]],

Thanks for getting back to us. We're excited about the possibility of partnering with you on [[INPUT=平台|select|YouTube;Instagram;TikTok]] showcasing some of our awesome controller protective cases Nintendo Switch, Xbox or PS5. We propose the following:

Deliverables

[[INPUT=产出数量]]*[[SCRIPT=ContentType|[[INPUT=平台]]]] on [[INPUT=平台]] showcasing PlayVital cases (featuring key benefits, functionality, and personal experience with them).

[[SCRIPT=videoLength|[[SCRIPT=ContentType|[[INPUT=平台]]]]]]

Timeline

Approximately [[INPUT=产出时间]] after receiving the products.

Affiliate Program

To make this partnership more rewarding. We'd like to invite you to join our affiliate program! This means your followers will not only discover awesome products through your reviews, but they'll also get a special 10% discount using your unique coupon code. Plus, you'll earn a 15% commission on every sale generated through your referrals!

Budget

We are offering [[INPUT=价格]] commission for this collaboration.

Payment

We will process the payment via PayPal upon receiving demo video.

Shipping

We are shipping internationally, We will ship the sample cases directly to your address. The estimate time depends on the address.

Sample Request

You can apply the samples by filling out this delivery form. We will arrange the shipping for you asap.

Note: Please note that some of the products are still on pre-order. To ensure the fastest delivery. We recommend you choose those are in stock.

Let us know if there is any question or concern. Look forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,
Tom
